[Super Day Mod Code]
DD000000 00000210
DB000000 007751F9
D4000000 00000001
D8000000 007751F9
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000220
DB000000 007751F9
D4000000 000000FF
D8000000 007751F9
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000140
207751EC 00000001
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000120
207751EC 00000002
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000180
207751EC 00000003
D0000000 00000000
[ NOTES:]
[ L+DPAD RIGHT = FASTFORWARD]
[ L+DPAD LEFT = REWIND]
[ R+DPAD UP = DAY ONE]
[ R+DPAD LEFT = DAY TWO]
[ R+DPAD DOWN = DAY THREE]
[if you are on any day above]
[the one your currently on]
[and wish to go back a day]
[activate the day you require]
[and leave the area for it to set]

[#DAY MOD#]
00000000 00000000

[Day 1]
207751EC 00000001

[Day 2]
207751EC 00000002

[Day 3]
207751EC 00000003

[PLAY AS HOLD L+R+?]
DD000000 00000340
207751FE 00000000
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000320
207751FE 00000001
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000380
207751FE 00000002
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000310
207751FE 00000003
D0000000 00000000
DD000000 00000301
207751FE 00000004
D0000000 00000000
[D UP = Fierce Diety Link]
[D LEFT = Goron Link]
[D DOWN = Zora Link]
[D RIGHT = Deku Link
[A = Normal Link]
[Notes: If you already have the mask you will]
[be stuck in a loop putting the mask on/off]
[to avoid this have the mask assigned to II, Y, X, I]
[this code will allow you to use Diety]
[form which would normally only be used]
